Is the investigation into Jeffrey Epstein's injuries still ongoing? I ask because we have a conference before Judge Berman 
tomorrow morning, and we expect that he will ask us about what happened at the MCC. If the investigation is still 
ongoing, we will tell him that. If it has been completed, would you please send us any new reports and whatever 
documentation sets forth the conclusions that the investigators reached? 
Thanks, 
Assistant United States Attorney 
Southern District of New York 
EFTA00019990

New York, NY 10007 
EFTA00019991
